database.name: VIEW OPCRM_FUNCINTERESTVIEW_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS opcrm_funcinterestview_v_id, ltoi.ad_client_id, ltoi.ad_org_id, ltoi.isactive, ltoi.created, ltoi.createdby, ltoi.updated, ltoi.updatedby, ltoi.opcrm_leadtointerests_id, fi.name, fi.opcrm_funcinterest_id, u.ad_user_id, u.email, u.phone, u.em_opcrm_leadstatus AS opcrm_leadstatus, u.em_opcrm_stat_stage_id AS opcrm_stat_stage_id, u.created AS leadcreated, u.firstname, u.lastname, u.em_opcrm_commercialname AS leadcommercialname, u.comments, u.em_opcrm_mobile AS mobile, u.em_opcrm_assigned_to AS assigned_to FROM opcrm_leadtointerests ltoi JOIN ad_user u ON ltoi.ad_user_id = u.ad_user_id JOIN opcrm_funcinterest fi ON fi.opcrm_funcinterest_id = ltoi.opcrm_funcinterest_id
